DOC.brief_summary: A Prospective Investigation Use Fluorescence Imaging da Vinci Surgical System Intraoperative Near Infrared Imaging Renal Cortical Tumors . To determine feasibility fluorescence image da Vinci Surgical System robotic partial nephrectomy procedure report perioperative outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Fluorescence Imaging da Vinci Surgical System Intraoperative Near Infrared Imaging
DOC.criteria: Ages 18 80 year . Urine pregnancy test negative woman childbearing potential prior surgery Subject able comply study procedures A CT MRI preoperative assessment renal cortical tumor The renal tumor must stage T1ab T2 Written inform consent . Subject significant liver disease , cirrhosis liver insufficiency abnormal liver function test , total bilirubin > 1.5 X normal and/or SGOT > 2X normal Subject uremia , serum creatinine > 2.0 mg/dl .
